description.en: "To be the strongest in the world!" That is Baki Hanma's dream. The mysterious, young, martial artist aspires to follow in his sinister father's footsteps as the world's strongest creature. But to what lengths will Baki go? We follow the young grappler as he matures in a world full of some of the strongest fighters and how he overcomes all obstacles in order to face his father one day in the fighting ring. From the jungles to and underground martial arts tournament, Baki is put to the test from fighters all over the world.
description.he: להיות הכי חזק בעולם! זה החלום של באקי הנמה. אמן הלחימה המסתורי, הצעיר, שואף לנצח את אביו שידוע בתור היצור החזק בעולם. אבל עד כמה רחוק יגיע באקי? אנו עוקבים אחר באקי הצעיר כשהוא מתבגר בעולם מלא בכמה מהלוחמים החזקים ביותר וכיצד הוא מתגבר על כל המכשולים כדי להתמודד עם אביו יום אחד. מהג'ונגלים ועד לטורניר אומנויות לחימה תת-קרקעיות, באקי עומד למבחן מלוחמים בכל רחבי העולם
description.pt-br: Baki Hanma é um jovem lutador que anseia seguir os passos de seu pai, Yujiro, e se tornar o mais forte lutador do mundo. Através disso, ele treina incansavelmente e luta constantemente para aprimorar suas habilidades e desenvolver seu corpo para atingir esses objetivos. Muitas batalhas intensas estão à frente de Baki, enquanto ele tenta se tornar o melhor e, finalmente, tirar o título de "Rei" de seu pai.

biography.en:
Keisuke Itagaki (板垣恵介, Itagaki Keisuke, born April 4, 1957) is a Japanese manga artist. He is best known for his martial arts series Grappler Baki (1991–1999) and its four sequels, which have sold over 75 million volumes. In 1996, he began working on Garōden, an original work by [Baku Yumemakura](https://mangadex.org/author/1b54d486-e3f2-4e5d-bc7f-d1247ab1e4db/baku-yumemakura). He has also collaborated on the series Garōden Boy.

Prior to becoming a manga artist, he served 5 years in the 1st Airborne Brigade of the Japan Ground Self-Defense Force. During his service he practiced amateur boxing, and has competed in the National Sports Festival. He also holds a degree in Shorinji Kempo, which he has practiced since he was a teenager.

He is the father of [Paru Itagaki](https://mangadex.org/author/de3c8aa9-7cd4-4e4c-92ae-bb435e4f6ef3/itagaki-paru), Beastars manga author.
